title: _SET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_COLOR
content:
0xE41033B25D003A07// SetVehicleXenonLightsColor
void _SET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_COLOR(Vehicle vehicle, int color);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.color: The paint index.Paint index goes from 0 to 12.You can find the list of colors and ids here: _GET_VEHICLE_HEADLIGHTS_COLOUROld name:  _SET_VEHICLE_HEADLIGHTS_COLOUROld name:  _SET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_COLOURExamples:Lualocal veh = GetVehiclePedIsUsing(PlayerPedId())
ToggleVehicleMod(veh, 22, true) -- toggle xenon
SetVehicleHeadlightsColour(veh, 2)
codeBlocks:
local veh = GetVehiclePedIsUsing(PlayerPedId())
ToggleVehicleMod(veh, 22, true) -- toggle xenon
SetVehicleHeadlightsColour(veh, 2)
